alertDescription.value: PureFA Volume Capacity Consumption will parse each volume's space used and each volume's size in bytes to calculate that volume's percentage used. If the difference in the percentage used in the window size of 5 minutes is greater than 50 percent then the information alarm will be raised.

query.value: InsightsMetrics | where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'purefa_volume_space_bytes' | extend Json = parse_json(Tags) | where Json.dimension == 'total' | extend Volume = tostring(Json.volume) | extend UsedVolumeBytes = Val | join kind=inner ( InsightsMetrics | where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'purefa_volume_space_size_bytes' | extend Json = parse_json(Tags) | extend Volume = tostring(Json.volume) | extend VolumeTotalBytes = Val) on _ResourceId, Volume | extend VolumePctUsed = UsedVolumeBytes / VolumeTotalBytes * 100 | project Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, Volume, VolumePctUsed | order by Volume | summarize DiffOverTime = max(VolumePctUsed) - min(VolumePctUsed) by Volume, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId
